Str.FuncTxt: local func_name = 'get_remove_debuff_tooltip_' .. TryGetProp(obj, 'ClassName', 'None') local func = _G[func_name] if func == nil then return end return func(obj.Level)

Num.FuncTxt: local abil = GetAbility(self, "QuarrelShooter6"); if abil ~= nil then return obj.Level; else return IMCRandom(1, obj.Level); end
local time = 30 if IsPVPField(self) == 1 then time = 900 end local abil = GetAbility(self, 'QuarrelShooter24') if abil ~= nil and abil.ActiveState == 1 then time = time * 0.5 end return time
local time = 30 local abil = GetAbility(self, 'QuarrelShooter24') if abil ~= nil and abil.ActiveState == 1 then time = time * 0.5 end return time
local value = 4000 local zone = GetZoneName(self); if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 or IsPVPField(self) == 1 then value = value * 0.5; end return value;
